ygData.subject: Re: Various
ygData.msgSnippet: Alright, your flaw here is saying that SK with super high resist gear . That means he s got good equip without assuming the same of the Necro. If the necro is
ygData.messageBody:
Alright, your flaw here is saying that "SK with
super high resist gear". That means he's got good equip
without assuming the same of the Necro. If the necro is
well equipped he can negate that factor. You'd be
surprised.<br><br>Keep in mind a necro is versatile. He can be a mana
battery, a nuker, and even a tank. If you read about that
new belt that gives casters haste, you will find a
necro detailing how he tanks... and the healers save a
lot of mana b/c of his tanking. His spells mob manage
and saves mana for clerics, and nukers. Necros are
the masters of party mana management in higher levels
(excluding mana regen that is). <br><br>It's some weird
combo of his spells, his 3 life taps cycling, an FBSS
and some other stuff. I'm not even sure he uses his
skel. And if you've ever had a druid or shaman in a
group with a necro that knows what his doing, have them
Regen or Chloro the necro. Let's just say it helps a
lot. Chloro is like Clarity 2 to a Necro. =)I won't
play one and know little about Necros other than the
fact that I do research so I know what I group with...
but... Many necros never group. It's not that they
wouldn't make good groups, but they can solo yellows from
early on all the way to like 50+. Druids that are well
set can Octakite, but they can't dispatch a yellow as
easily as a Necro can.<br><br>shooman out<br><br>PS...
also didn't say that an SK couldn't win on any given
day. But it'd have to be a good SK, and very well
equipped as well as know how to take down a Necro. It's a
very specific knowledge. Different classes take
different methods to take down. It's not just a matter of
high resistances. It's knowing when to pumice, how to
target using all hotkeys when nothing shows up on the
screen and how to break fear or what to do when feared.
Etc. <br><br>I agree that skill and items you have
play a large part of it. I even mentioned the Warrior
streak and winner of that last EQ PVP competition. But
typically, there's an expectation.<br><br>shooman out
